name: Peanut Butter, Bacon and Honey Sandwich
author: Cheryl Jones
summary: Toasted whole wheat or multi-grain bread really makes the difference with this bizarre yet delicious savory/sweet combo. Try apple- or maple-smoked bacon for the best flavor.
directions: Place the bacon in a skillet, and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crisp, about 10 minutes
Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate
Toast the slices of whole wheat bread in a toaster, and spread a toasted slice with peanut butter and honey
Place the bacon on the honey, top with the remaining toasted bread slice, and serve
